content.rendered:
Premium Quality Pro-Neck Sublimated Ice Hockey Jersey

Our Pro-Neck sublimated ice hockey jerseys are crafted from 100% polyester, ensuring top-notch quality and durability. Designed specifically for performance, these jerseys are moisture-wicking, keeping players comfortable and dry during intense matches. The Pro-Neck style provides a professional look that is both stylish and functional, making it a perfect choice for teams at any level.

High-Definition Sublimation Printing

We utilize modern dyed HD sublimation printing techniques to offer exceptional print quality and vibrant colors. Our overall print options allow for full customization, giving you the freedom to design jerseys that reflect your team’s unique identity. Whether you need bold patterns or intricate designs, our advanced sublimation process ensures that your graphics are sharp and long-lasting.

Customization and Branding

Understanding the importance of team identity, we offer extensive customization options, including labeling and branding on demand. You can choose any color combination to match your team’s branding, and we provide sizes ranging from S to 3XL to accommodate all players. Our commitment to quality is reflected in the fine panel work and precise stitching of each jersey, guaranteeing a professional finish.

Reliable Supply and Minimum Order Quantity

As a dedicated manufacturer and supplier, we ensure a reliable supply of high-quality ice hockey jerseys with a minimum order quantity (MOQ) of 40. This makes it easy for teams to place bulk orders while maintaining consistency in design and quality. Our streamlined production process ensures timely delivery, meeting the needs of teams and distributors alike.

Elevate Your Team’s Performance with Pro Neck Ice Hockey Jerseys – Perfect for Bulk Orders!

  • Material : 100% Polyester
  • Style :Pro Neck
  • Durability : Moisture-wicking | Performance
  • Embellishment : Modern dyed HD sublimation
  • Print Options : Overall
  • Customization : Labeling & branding on demand
  • Color : Any/On demand
  • Finishing : Panel Work with fine stitching
  • Sizes : S to 3XL (Available on demand)
  • MOQ : 40
